posts.title: self introduction
posts.text: INTRODUCE MYSELF MY NAME IS JUNCHENG TAO, ISSAC. I am an undergraduate student from Sun Yat-sen University. My current area of interest lies in utilizing deep learning or large model approaches to tackle computer vision or multimodal problems related to computer vision. This account is primarily used to manage my personal webpage, upload some of my course designs, and showcase some of my personal project achievements.

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
